obligations.label: Maintain Responsible Charge
obligations.definition: Duty to be actively engaged in the engineering process from conception to completion
obligations.source_text: Engineer A did not maintain responsible charge in violation of licensure law

obligations.label: Protect Client Confidentiality
obligations.definition: Duty not to disclose confidential client information without prior consent
obligations.violation: Uploaded client data to open-source AI without consent
obligations.source_text: Per Code section II.1.c, confidential information can only be shared with prior consent of the Client

obligations.label: Provide Proper Attribution
obligations.definition: Duty to give credit for engineering work to those to whom credit is due
obligations.scope: Include appropriate citations and acknowledge significant contributions
obligations.source_text: engineers are required to give credit for engineering work to those to whom credit is due

obligations.label: Exercise Professional Judgment
obligations.definition: Duty to apply engineering judgment rather than relying blindly on tool outputs
obligations.scope: Review, challenge, and understand AI recommendations before acceptance
obligations.source_text: technology must never be a replacement of a substitute for engineering judgment

obligations.label: Comply with Licensure Law
obligations.definition: Duty to adhere to state engineering licensure requirements
obligations.violation: Failed to maintain responsible charge as required by licensure law
obligations.source_text: Engineer A did not maintain responsible charge in violation of licensure law which violates Code section III.8.a

obligations.label: Consider AI Disclosure
obligations.definition: Ethical obligation to consider disclosing AI involvement when it plays a significant role in work products
obligations.status: No universal mandate but ethical principles favor transparency
obligations.source_text: Ethical principles favor transparency when AI plays a substantial role in generating work products
